Definitions : Preeclampsia define hypertension ( sustained elevation systolic BP least 140 mmHg and/or diastolic BP least 90 mmHg least 6 hour ) association proteinuria ( 300 mg/24 hour ) concentration least 30 mg/dl ( least 1+ dipstick ) least 2 random urine sample collect least 6 hour apart .
